personal.name: Federico Sabbadini
personal.title: Master's Student in Computer Engineering
personal.tagline: Curious and determined person with a strong interest in technology and problem-solving. I approach challenges with commitment and consistency, aiming to continuously improve both my technical and analytical skills.
personal.bio: Born in 2002 and based in the province of Brescia, Italy. I completed my scientific high school education at Istituto Salesiano Don Bosco in Chiari (BS) and earned a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Brescia. I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Engineering, expected to be completed in Autumn 2026.

education.description: Specializing in cybersecurity, systems administration, artificial intelligence, and advanced software engineering.
Focused on computer systems, networks, software development, and security fundamentals.

interests.title: Sports
interests.description: Swimming, skiing, tennis, soccer, and karate. These activities have helped me develop discipline, determination, and teamwork skills.

interests.title: Music
interests.description: Classical guitar player. Music has enhanced my artistic sensitivity and attention to detail.

interests.title: Continuous Learning
interests.description: Passionate about reading, technology trends, and staying updated with the latest developments in cybersecurity and AI.

interests.title: Travel & Culture
interests.description: Study abroad experiences in Germany and USA have broadened my cultural perspective and language skills.
